name: Nira
description:
Nira is a fast paced action packed explore and survival game. Explore endless procedurally generated worlds and collect resources along your journey. Build a base, fly a plane, hunt or tame animals, farm or fish for food, and fight to stay alive.

Explore, build, fight, and survive.

Features:

  • Explore endless open worlds and collect resources along your journey
  • Build base to defend yourself from creatures in the night
  • Tame or hunt animals, go fishing, fly a plane; do whatever you want
  • Craft weapons and shoot up hordes of goblins and huge beasts
